feature1.explanation: Both texts use informal language and include expletives, suggesting a similar style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit lexical diversity and use emotive language, indicating a shared writing style.

feature3.explanation: Both texts display similar sentence structures with emotional and impactful statements, supporting the idea of a common author.

feature4.explanation: Both texts convey a strong emotional tone and express frustration towards a common subject, hinting at a consistent authorial voice.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text, indicating a level of care in writing, possibly from the same author.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in writing style across punctuation, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structures, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
